PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-00972021-02-26,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectInterim Order No. 3 Respecting Certain Training Requirements (B-737-8 and Other Aircraft)
PrecisOrder approving INTERIM ORDER NO. 3 RESPECTING CERTAIN TRAINING REQUIREMENTS (B-737 AND OTHER AIRCRAFT), made by the Minister of Transport on February 15, 2021, in order to extend the validity of the Interim Order for one year, which identifies the training program requirements that Canadian air operators need to meet in order to operate the Boeing 737-8 aircraft in Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
